title: Drawing Universe
description:
Oh No! An evil comet is headed towards Earth for a head on collision! Can you stop it?

Drawing Universe is a 2D platformer with 360 degree gravity. Not only do you jump from planet to planet, but you can draw your own with the touch pad or right stick!

DRAWING UNIVERSE IS GRAVITY!
360 degree phisics is the name of the game!

DRAWING UNIVERSE IS DRAWINGS!
Draw planets on to the screen! You can also draw fire, water, ice and more kinds of planets!

DRAWING UNIVERSE IS MULTIPLAYER!
Play against all of your friends! If you don't have enough controllers, you can use your phone or iPod as a gamepad! This means over 4 players parties!!!

DRAWING UNIVERSE IS HUGE!
It has 100 normal levels + 100 Drawing Galaxy levels! There are also special levels for guest characters!

DRAWING UNIVERSE HAS GUEST STARS!
Play as your favourite characters from other games and more!

DRAWING UNIVERSE IS COMPLETELY FREE!
That's right, you don't have to pay a cent for Drawing Universe! Ever! Just my gift to you. Have a go, why not!

releases.cert_subject: C = AUS, L = MEL, O = ATG, OU = ATG, CN = DU

overview: Released in October 2013 by Alex Tritt Games.
